strings.language.label: Language
strings.hero.eyebrow: Earn From Scratch â€¢ Lazy Earn â€¢ Lazy Money
strings.hero.copy: Earn.lazying.art is a living gallery of lazy money concepts. We mix Earn From Scratch foundations with playful automations so every income stream feels like a lounge day.
strings.hero.cardFoot: A simple loop that keeps paying you while you chill. Tune the loop, grow the lounge fund.
strings.section1.heading: The un-boring blueprint for starting from zero
strings.section1.copy: Earn From Scratch is our slow-burn starter kit. It is proof that you can start with curiosity, honor the lounge lifestyle, and still stack revenue.
strings.section1.card1Body: Capture obsessions, questions, or frustrations. Every lazy money loop starts with a fascination that refuses to sit still.
strings.section1.card2Body: Prototype in public, build small proof loops, then automate the boring bits. No grind, just curiosity-led craft.
strings.section1.card3Body: Layer memberships, templates, and mini-services so revenue streams overlap like cozy blankets.
strings.section2.heading: Lazy Earn turns effort into air.
strings.section2.copy: It is a creative system for automating repeatable wins. We design cushy systems so our brains stay on vacation and our income keeps streaming in.
strings.section2.feature1: âœ¨ Cinematic landing pages that sell while you sleep.
strings.section2.feature2: ğŸ” Automation rituals that nudge, sell, and deliver.
strings.section2.feature3: ğŸ§  Idea vaults that remix work into evergreen drops.
strings.section2.meterCopy: The goal: earn more, yawn more, rush less. Lazy Earn keeps the baseline vibe at "weekend forever."
strings.section3.heading: Choose your flavor of effortless income
strings.section3.copy: Pick the lazy loop that matches your energy. Remix them. Layer them. Own the rest days.
strings.idea.card1Body: Monetize your living room aesthetic with downloadable "lazy cloud" moodboards, playlists, and product bundles.
strings.idea.card2Body: Record three snackable voice notes, turn them into week-long micro podcasts that drip evergreen sponsorship.
strings.idea.card3Body: Curate a single page of indulgent tools. Auto-embed fresh deals, pair with AI shopping concierge, collect soft income.
strings.idea.card4Body: Host quarterly campfires. Teach the blueprint in weekends, hand off automations, collect alumni royalties.
strings.idea.card5Body: Turn every repeated DM, deck, and doc into a template pack. Bundle, license, dine off royalties.
strings.idea.card6Body: Calm-looking analytics that monitor side hustles. Charge for the dashboard plus the vibe.
strings.section4.heading: Spin up a lazy earn experiment
strings.section4.copy: Tap the generator, get a fresh Earn From Scratch concept infused with Lazy Money sauce. Run it this weekend, automate it next.
strings.idea.default: Press the button to reveal your next relaxed income loop.
strings.section5.heading: Earn, chill, repeat.
strings.section5.copy: Subscribe to the Lazy Earn letter, claim invites to new templates, and watch over-the-top experiments unfold in real time.
strings.form.label: Your most relaxed email
strings.panel.title: Lazy Money Ritual
strings.panel.step2: Pick one Earn From Scratch spark.
strings.panel.step4: Share the loop, gather lazy revenue.
strings.footer.tagline: earn.lazying.art Â· built for effortless expression.
strings.form.success: Invite sent to {{email}}. Expect a lazy hello soon.

ideas.lazySprint: Launch a 5-day Lazy Earn sprint teaching people to automate one newsletter ad slot, then sell replay access.
ideas.dreamDesk: Bundle your workflows into a 'Dream Desk OS' Notion template that pairs automations with nap reminders.
ideas.meditativeStories: Record meditative money stories, run them as looping background audio with embedded affiliate links.
ideas.concierge: Offer a Lazy Earn Concierge: you map someone's existing assets, then design three automated income flows.
ideas.zeroMeetings: Create a 'Zero Meetings Agency' where clients buy async strategy videos and auto-scheduled deliverables.
ideas.aiDashboards: Spin up a micro-store of AI-remixed, pastel financial dashboards with white-glove onboarding videos.
ideas.slowLounges: Host virtual slow lounges where guests co-build digital assets, sell recurring memberships on autopilot.
ideas.licensingKit: Design a Lazy Money licensing kit: pre-baked marketing, copy, and automations others can stamp their brand on.
ideas.moodboards: Curate monthly 'Earn From Scratch' moodboards with swipe copy, embed sponsor sections for ad revenue.
ideas.napBot: Build a nap-friendly accountability bot that texts prompts, upsell a Lazy Earn mastermind for deeper access.
